    remove view, notify disconnection and change gameState to GAME_OVER if it has not been done already, then end the game if views is empty

    notify the board to every view

    private void notifyDisconnection​(VirtualView disconnectedView)
    notify every view that a view disconnected
    private void notifyLobby()
    notify the lobby to every view
    void notifyVictory​(int winnerNumber)
    notify every view that a player has won
    private void performAction​(Tile targetTile, Player player)
    perform a build or a move in the target tile and check if the player has won with that move, if it has notifyVictory and set gameState to GAME_OVER, if not: set next step, activate worker power if it's stepNumber 2 and it hasChoice, set up next turn if turn is finished, else just update valid tiles, notifyBoard.
    private void placeWorker​(Tile selectedTile, Player player)
    create a new worker, assign it to the player, and place it on the selected tile; then change the gameState to MATCH or change turn if needed, save the board to restore after undos, notify board
    void processSelection​(SelectedTileMessage message, Player player)
    skip undo if the performMove method was waiting for it, control that selection is valid, then depending on what type of selection it is, either call selectWorker, performAction, or placeWorker
    void receiveUndo​(Player player)
    save that undo has arrived if undo is possible
    private void removeView​(VirtualView view)
    remove view from views, remove player from game
    private void selectWorker​(Tile selectedTile, Player player)
    if a the selected tile contains a valid worker select it and update validTiles, else deselect any selected worker and clear validTiles; then notify board
    void setPlayerCard​(CardMessage message, VirtualView view)
    notify every view that a view disconnected
    void setPowerActive()
    set activePlayer's powerActive, pass turn if it's finished else update validTiles, then notify board
    private void setUpNextTurn​(Step currentStep, Step previousStep)
    do all the operations needed to set up the next turn.
    private void startGame()
    change gameState to WORKERS_PLACEMENT state, start game, notify players of the board
    private void startGameCreation​(VirtualView firstView)
    add view, set gameState to SET_UP state, start gameCreation, tell server that this controller is waiting for new players
    private void updateValidTiles()
    updates the validTiles

      public Game getGame()
      Returns:

      public boolean isLobbyJoinable()
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is joinable else false

      add view to views, add player to lobby
      Parameters:
      view - view to add

    • startGameCreation

      private void startGameCreation​(VirtualView firstView)
      add view, set gameState to SET_UP state, start gameCreation, tell server that this controller is waiting for new players
      Parameters:
      firstView - view to add and to start set up

    • createLobby

      public void createLobby​(GameSetUpMessage message, VirtualView view)
      change gameState to LOBBY state, creates lobby, adds the first view to it
      Parameters:
      message - contains the god names to create the lobby
      view - first view to add to lobby

    • startGame

      private void startGame()
      change gameState to WORKERS_PLACEMENT state, start game, notify players of the board

    • endGame

      private void endGame()
      close completely the game and all its references

    • notifyLobby

      private void notifyLobby()
      notify the lobby to every view

    • notifyBoard

      public void notifyBoard()
      notify the board to every view

    • notifyDefeat

      public void notifyDefeat​(Player defeatedPlayer)
      notify defeatedView that it has no more moves
      Parameters:
      defeatedPlayer - player who has no more moves available

    • notifyVictory

      public void notifyVictory​(int winnerNumber)
      notify every view that a player has won
      Parameters:
      winnerNumber - number of the player who has won

    • notifyDisconnection

      private void notifyDisconnection​(VirtualView disconnectedView)
      notify every view that a view disconnected
      Parameters:
      disconnectedView - view that disconnected

    • setPlayerCard

      public void setPlayerCard​(CardMessage message, VirtualView view)
      notify every view that a view disconnected
      Parameters:
      message - view that disconnected
      view - view that disconnected

    • setPowerActive

      public void setPowerActive()
      set activePlayer's powerActive, pass turn if it's finished else update validTiles, then notify board

    • receiveUndo

      public void receiveUndo​(Player player)
      save that undo has arrived if undo is possible

    • processSelection

      public void processSelection​(SelectedTileMessage message, Player player)
      skip undo if the performMove method was waiting for it, control that selection is valid, then depending on what type of selection it is, either call selectWorker, performAction, or placeWorker
      Parameters:
      message - contains target tile position
      player - is the player that is selecting

    • handleDisconnection

      public void handleDisconnection​(VirtualView view)
      remove view, notify disconnection and change gameState to GAME_OVER if it has not been done already, then end the game if views is empty
      Parameters:
      view - it is the disconnected view

    • isTurnFinished

      private boolean isTurnFinished()
      Returns:
      true is turn is finished false if it's not

    • setUpNextTurn

      private void setUpNextTurn​(Step currentStep, Step previousStep)
      do all the operations needed to set up the next turn. In specific addEffectOnOpponents, resetCard so that it's not decorated anymore, set up game class parameters for next turn, defeat a player if it has no more moves left and then notify it, clear validTiles, save board so that can be restored when undo is activated
      Parameters:
      currentStep - the step that the active player has just performed

    • hasPlayerMovesLeft

      private boolean hasPlayerMovesLeft()
      Returns:
      true if player has moves left, false otherwise

    • addEffectOnOpponents

      private void addEffectOnOpponents​(Step currentStep, Step previousStep)
      if the active player's effect on others is active, decorate other players cards with its decorator
      Parameters:
      previousStep - step that the active player performed
      currentStep - step that the active player has just performed

    • placeWorker

      private void placeWorker​(Tile selectedTile, Player player)
      create a new worker, assign it to the player, and place it on the selected tile; then change the gameState to MATCH or change turn if needed, save the board to restore after undos, notify board
      Parameters:
      selectedTile - tile where a worker is to be placed
      player - active player

    • selectWorker

      private void selectWorker​(Tile selectedTile, Player player)
      if a the selected tile contains a valid worker select it and update validTiles, else deselect any selected worker and clear validTiles; then notify board
      Parameters:
      selectedTile - tile where a worker should be selected
      player - active player

    • performAction

      private void performAction​(Tile targetTile, Player player)
      perform a build or a move in the target tile and check if the player has won with that move, if it has notifyVictory and set gameState to GAME_OVER, if not: set next step, activate worker power if it's stepNumber 2 and it hasChoice, set up next turn if turn is finished, else just update valid tiles, notifyBoard. While this is done if a valid undo message arrives the undo function is called and the undo is performed instead
      Parameters:
      targetTile - controlled tile where the selected worker is performing the action
      player - active player

    • updateValidTiles

      private void updateValidTiles()
      updates the validTiles

    • calculateValidMoves

      private boolean[][] calculateValidMoves​(Step currentStep, Player player)
      Returns:
      the validTiles of the possible move that the selectedPlayer can do

    • calculateValidBuilds

      private boolean[][] calculateValidBuilds​(Step currentStep, Player player)
      Returns:
      the validTiles of the possible builds that the selectedPlayer can do
